fields.name: id
docs: The primary key of the leverage finance

fields.name: admin
docs: Account that has admin authority over the leveragefi

fields.name: paused
docs: Disable all protocol operations

fields.name: jlpInterestRate
docs: The jlp interest rate, basic unit for margin interest calculation

fields.name: penaltyInterestRate
docs: Penalty interest point

fields.name: withdrawFeeRate
docs: jlp withdraw fee rate for taking profit, 10000 as unit

fields.name: protocolFeeRate
docs: interest fee rate, 10000 as unit

fields.name: leveragefi
docs: Primary key of the LeverageFi to create pool

fields.name: admin
docs: Account that has admin authority over the account

fields.name: jlpMint
docs: The JLP token mint

fields.name: jlpAccount
docs: The JLP token account

fields.name: jupiterNotes
docs: The total amount of notes issued to jupiter account users

fields.name: jlpPosition
docs: The total amount of JLP position, currently unused, value: 0

fields.name: leveragefi
docs: Primary key of the LeverageFi to create pool

fields.name: vault
docs: The address of the vault account, which has custody of the
pool's tokens

fields.name: feeDestination
docs: The address of the account to deposit collected fees, represented as
deposit notes

fields.name: poolAuthority
docs: The pool authority to act

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The token the pool allows lending and borrowing on

fields.name: tokenPriceOracle
docs: The address of the pyth oracle with price information for the token

fields.name: borrowedTokens
docs: The total amount of tokens borrowed, that need to be repaid to
the pool.

fields.name: depositTokens
docs: The total amount of tokens available in the pool's vault

fields.name: depositNotes
docs: The total amount of notes issued to depositors of tokens.

fields.name: loanNotes
docs: The total amount of notes issued to borrowers of tokens

fields.name: depositInterest
docs: Amount of unpaid interest to depositors, for deposit note exchange rate calculation

fields.name: loanInterest
docs: Amount of unrepaid interest by borrowers, for loan note exchange rate calculation

fields.name: protocolFee
docs: 10% of interest goes to the protocol,

fields.name: accruedUntil
docs: The time the interest was last accrued up to

fields.name: utilizationFlag
docs: If the utilization rate is flagged as full

accounts.name: MarginAccount
docs: User margin state, with collateral & loan details

fields.name: leveragefi
docs: Primary key of the LeverageFi to create pool

fields.name: owner
docs: Owner authority which can borrow liquidity

fields.name: deposits
docs: Deposited collateral, unique by deposit reserve address

fields.name: loans
docs: Borrowed liquidity, unique by borrow reserve address

fields.name: leverage
docs: Leverage info

fields.name: jlpNotes
docs: Holding JLP quota, JLP obtained from swapping borrowed USDC

fields.name: activeLoan
docs: Loan asset used for leverage, each account can only borrow one type of asset
Resets to PUBKEY_DEFAULT upon repaying all loan with interest

fields.name: activeCollateral
docs: Collateral asset used for leverage, each account can only collateralize one type of asset
Resets to PUBKEY_DEFAULT upon repaying all loan with interest

types.name: CollateralDetail
docs: collateral detailed state

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The deposited token

fields.name: depositNote
docs: Amount of collateral deposited, deposit note

fields.name: depositToken
docs: Amount of collateral deposited, token

fields.name: marketValue
docs: Total value of deposits, front-end use only

types.name: LoanDetail
docs: Obligation liquidity state

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The borrowed token

fields.name: loanNote
docs: Amount of asset loan, loan note

fields.name: loanToken
docs: Amount of asset loan, token

fields.name: loanValue
docs: Total value of loan, front-end use only

types.name: Amount
docs: Represent an amount of some value (like tokens, or notes)

types.name: PoolAction
docs: Represents the primary pool actions, used in determining the
rounding direction between tokens and notes.

types.name: RoundingDirection
docs: Represents the direction in which we should round when converting
between tokens and notes.

errors.name: NotStakePool
errors.msg: Failed to deserialize stake pool account

errors.name: InvalidLoanType
errors.msg: Only one type of loan asset per account

errors.name: InvalidCollateralType
errors.msg: Only one type of collateral asset per account

errors.name: InvalidAfterAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount provided to post-swap ix
